post.body: I keep meaning to check this out. Thanks for the reminder.

buuuullshit.

surprisingly no.
I don't exactly get what your problem with it is?

Say "Hi" to Brynna, Alex, Darryl, Martin, Maxwell, and anyone else you might see while you're not naked in bed for me.
you must be in Betlin now.

There wont be snow in Africa this Christmastime.
Grilled cheese with an egg inside with a coffee n' OJ.

Prepping dinner, drinkin Jameson, eatin cheese and crackers, listening to a mumdance mix. Jealous?
First Music Waste meeting for 2009 tonight. Big things. Next level.

Knead to know. Need to? No!
Calling it now: 2009 will be the year of the crooner.
OMGz. It snowed in Vancouver. I love that the media always makes such a big deal over this . And by love I mean think it's absurd
An actor just told of a failed pilot called LUMP: Little Underappreciated Meat Puppets. A sitcom about a support group for men with smal ...
He's talking about all of his guns.
For the amount of aspiring Asian pop singers I've met in my life it's pretty surprising how few Asian pop singers there are. I call racist.
I just got a fine for drinking in public on main and hastings. Not even drunk. Tax dollars at work.
Merriweather Post Pavillion: Best album of 2009. Calling it now.
The new animal collective is perfect.

Sorry, since when did apps have ratings?

aaaaaaaaand it's snowing again. I'm grabbing a coffee and going home.

The easiest part of being poor during the holidays is all of Starbucks gift cards I get. I can eat free for at least two weeks.
